extends AccountDAOs
implements edu.uw.ext.framework.dao.AccountDao, edu.uw.ext.framework.dao.DaoFactory
    Implentation which defines the methods needed to get, store, and delete accounts from a persistent storage mechanism.

    slajaunie

      • checkForDuplicateUsername

        public boolean checkForDuplicateUsername(edu.uw.ext.framework.account.Account account)
        Checks to see if an account already exists, returns true if accountName already exists, otherwise false- not currently using, but keeping just in case it proves useful later. The operation distinguishes between adding a new account or updating an existing account by checking for a name already existing in the directory with the given Account's name. If a match is found, the hashed passwords between the two accounts are compared- if they match, it is assumed this is an update to an existing account. If they do not match, it is assumed this is an attempt to add a new account with a duplicte name
        Parameters:
        account - the account to check for duplicates
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether a duplicate exists- true if an account by that name already exists, otherwise false
